column4: so if i want to install linux on an old Pentium 3 box, what version of linux should i use? Kubuntu, Xubuntu???
it's not *buntu anymore, but #! might be worth a real shot

I mean (crunchbang linux, i.e. #! see #crunchbang perhaps) is lighter than xubuntu, bazhang says lubuntu can be lighter, but #! comes very very light already - openbox on debian (used to be on ubuntu)
